system.description: You change the weather in the local area. Casting takes 10 minutes; effects manifest 10 minutes later. You control general tendencies (wind direction and intensity), not specific applications (where lightning strikes). Weather continues for the duration or until you use a standard action to designate new weather (manifests 10 min. later). Contradictory conditions are not possible. Control weather can dispel atmospheric phenomena as well as create them. A druid casting this spell doubles the duration and affects a 3-mile radius.
